name: Horké léto
storyline:
The main character of the game is Honza Majer, who will introduce himself at the beginning of the game with the words: "I am an ordinary kid. Guys call me Rambo and girls asshole. Otherwise, I'm Majer. Honza Majer".   
  
Honza's father is a professor of botany and so whole family go with him to the Pacific  Island where he can study local flora. But one day all, but Honza who was just hiding before any work in the jungle, are captured. And we have to save them.
summary: Horké léto (Hot summer) is a Czech adventure from 1998. It was the best-selling Czech game of the year. Created by Maxon Studio. This is the first part of the game series in which Centauri Production continued.
